title: How Militants In Iraq Could Affect U.S.-Iran Relations
teaser: President Obama said this week that Iran could play a constructive role in Iraq. But it wasn't that long ago when we heard the exact opposite. NPR's Arun Rath talks to former senior State Department adviser Vali Nasr about how the insurgency in Iraq may affect the diplomatic relationship between the U.S. and Iran.
